name: Humpty Dumpty's Pro Sitter
description:
How to play:

Hold left or right arrow keys to prevent Humpty Dumpty from falling off the wall through curves.

Source code: https://github.com/kevinms/godot-wild-jam-28

Game developers/designers:

  • Kevin Smith
  • Wray Bowling

Software:

  • Godot v3.2.3.stable.official
  • GIMP 2.10.22
  • Blender v2.83.4

HDRI Skymap: Greg Zaal - https://hdrihaven.com/hdri/?c=skies&h=kiara_1_dawn
